Primary Contact: Bonnie Fraser, Employment Manager; Email: em@pathwayskelowna.ca
Alternate Contact: Charisse Daley, Executive Director; Phone: 250.763.4837; Email: ed@pathwayskelowna.ca
Service Details: - Administers the Lost and Stolen Bike Program on behalf of the City of Kelowna and offers used bike sales- The Bikeways lost and Stolen Bike Program also helps provide employment for people with diverse abilities, with the proceeds going to our not-for-profit society- Also accepts and re-sells donated bikes that are in good working order- Also sells used bicycle parts- Please contact us if you are looking for specific used bike parts- Please note that all bikes are sold as is
Hours: Please call; store hours vary depending on the season.
Former Name: Kelowna & District Society for Community Living (KDSCL) ; Kelowna Diversified Industries (Kelowna & District Society for Community Living)
